Perceptor:

"I'm afraid that you can't help me"sighned Perceptor"I need a real 
killer that teach my precious assistant to destroy...If you let me, 
I have to receive a new comer"

Perceptor started to walk and he opened his com link, "Here's 
Perceptor... I'm going to speak with you" 

Perceptor walked towards the exit.
